Easy to style for casual and semi-casual looks

faqs.best_use: Casual wear, daily commuting, light walking.
faqs.is_it_waterproof: No, it is not waterproof. Use a protective spray for rainy days.
faqs.is_it_good_for_all_day_wear: Yes, the cushioning supports long hours of use.
faqs.does_it_run_true_to_size: Yes, most users find it true to size.
faqs.how_do_i_clean_it: Use a soft brush with mild soap and air-dry.
